name: Akshay Soni
body:
### About
I am a Scientist with Yahoo! and work on personalization and content recommendation. I got my PhD from University of Minnesota, Twin Cities with Prof. Jarvis Haupt. My research interests include Machine Learning, Collaborative Filtering, Compressive Sensing, Signal Processing and Large Scale Optimization. 

### Publications
#### 2016
* Akshay Soni, Swayambhoo Jain, Jarvis Haupt and Stefano Gonella "[Noisy Matrix Completion Under Sparse Factor Models](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/login.jsp?tp=&arnumber=7445217&url=http%3A%2F%2Fieeexplore.ieee.org%2Fxpls%2Fabs_all.jsp%3Farnumber%3D7445217)," IEEE Transactions on Information Theory
